member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.updateUnitsAutomatically
member.summary: (Experimental) Whether the unit database should be incrementally updated whenever a codebase change is detected.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.predictPotentialNullReferences
member.summary: Whether predictive debugging should warn about null value inputs. Note that in some cases, this setting may report false positives.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.predictPotentialMissingComponents
member.summary: Whether predictive debugging should warn about missing components. Note that in some cases, this setting may report false positives.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.showConnectionValues
member.summary: Whether values should be shown on flow graph connections.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.predictConnectionValues
member.summary: Whether predictable values should be shown on flow graph connections.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.hidePortLabels
member.summary: Whether labels should be hidden on ports when the value can be deduced from the context. Disabling will make units more explicit but less compact.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.animateControlConnections
member.summary: Whether active control connections should show a droplet animation.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.animateValueConnections
member.summary: Whether active value connections should show a droplet animation.

member.name: P:Bolt.BoltFlowConfiguration.skipContextMenu
member.summary: When active, right-clicking a flow graph will skip the context menu and instantly open the fuzzy finder. To open the context menu, hold shift.

member.name: T:Bolt.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Bolt.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Bolt.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Bolt.Resources.License_MIT
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to The MIT License (MIT)
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
